<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get current account user"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/user"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get information about the current user in the context of the current account.

This endpoint requires use of a JSON Web Token (JWT) scoped to a specific user.
If no user is specified, this will return an error.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
